revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Agnus Defender |image = Mio Agnus Defender.jpeg |caption = Agnus Defender |category = Boss |type = [[Agnus Forces]] |level = 8 |area = [[Alfeto Valley]] ([[Gura Flava Lowlands]]) |spawntime = Story, during ''[[Chapter 1 (XC3)|Chapter 1]]'' |respawn = No |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = |gold = |hp = |strength = |ether = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate = }} The '''Agnus Defender''' is a [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] in {{XC3}}. She is an [[Agnus Forces|Agnus Soldier]] and is fought at level 8 at the [[Gura Flava Lowlands]] in [[Alfeto Valley]]. She is then revealed to be [[Mio]]. {{clr}}
{{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Agnus Forces]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 6-10 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Agnus Duoblade |image = |caption = Agnus Duoblade |category = Normal Enemy |type = [[Agnus Forces]] |level = 5 |area = [[Alfeto Valley]]
[[Erythia Sea]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Agnus Duoblades''' are enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They are [[Agnus Forces|Agnus Soldiers]], and can be found at level 5 in [[Alfeto Valley]], or at [[Erythia Sea]] in the [[Cadensia Region]]. {{clr}} == Stats == {{Enemy arts|art1=Run Through}} {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 1-5 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Story Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Agnus Forces]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Aurora Shelf Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Agnus Forces]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{spoiler}} [[File:XC3 Agnus Screenshot.png|thumb|Soldiers of Agnus]] Throughout {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}, the player will encounter various '''Agnus Forces''' as enemies. They are members of [[Agnus]].
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Ag. Skirmisher Elite]] * [[Agnus Attacker]] * [[Agnus Blaster]] * [[Agnus Blaster Elite]] * [[Agnus Duoblade]] * [[Agnus Duoblade Elite]] * [[Agnus Medic]] * [[Agnus Medic Elite]] * [[Agnus Scout]] * [[Agnus Skirmisher]] * [[Agnus Vanguard]] * [[Agnus Vanguard Elite]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Foots]] (During ''[[Shadow of Enmity]]'') * [[Jail Blaster]] (During ''[[In Search of a Home]]'') * [[Jail Duoblade]] (During ''In Search of a Home'') * [[Jail Medic]] (During ''In Search of a Home'') * [[Jail Scout]] (During ''In Search of a Home'') * [[Jail Skirmisher]] (During ''In Search of a Home'') * [[Jail Vanguard]] (During ''In Search of a Home'') * [[Mina]] (During ''Shadow of Enmity'') * [[Nagumo]] (During ''Shadow of Enmity'') * [[Schoon]] (During ''Shadow of Enmity'') * [[Ysorra]] (During ''Shadow of Enmity'') * [[Zakir]] (During ''Shadow of Enmity'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Darkening Asha]] * [[Fleeting Shikino]] * [[Ghosting Lulika]] * [[Godlike Krastor]] * [[Miraging Yuri]] * [[Impregnable Sandhu]]
=== Bosses === * [[Agnus Attacker (boss)|Agnus Attacker]] * [[Agnus Defender (boss)|Agnus Defender]] * [[Agnus Healer]] * [[Miyabi#Battle|Glorysong Miyabi]] * [[Hackt#Battle|Hackt]] * [[Queen of Agnus (boss)|Queen of Agnus]] * [[Cammuravi#Battle|Smoldering Cammuravi]]
=== Quest Exclusive Bosses === * [[Agnus Fighter A]] (During ''[[Natural Selection]]'') * [[Agnus Fighter B]] (During ''Natural Selection'') * [[Agnus Fighter C]] (During ''Natural Selection'') * [[Agnus Fighter D]] (During ''Natural Selection'') * [[Agnus Fighter E]] (During ''Natural Selection'') * [[Agnus Vanguard Elite (boss)|Agnus Vanguard Elite]] (The "Erythia Relay Force", during ''[[A Farewell Reset]]'') * [[Alexandria#Battle|Craftmaiden Alexandria]] (During ''[[Her Reasons]]'') * [[Teach#Battle|Inscrutable Teach]] (During ''[[Going Beyond Power]]'') * [[Prison Warden]] (During ''[[In Search of a Home]]'')
=== Challenge Battle Mode Enemies === * [[Isurd#Challenge Battle|Dawnhero Isurd]] * [[Juniper#Challenge Battle|Ghostbow Juniper]] * [[Fiona#Challenge Battle|Proudbanner Fiona]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Agnus Attacker]] * [[Agnus Blaster]] * [[Agnus Defender]] * [[Agnus Duoblade]] * [[Agnus High Scout]] * [[Agnus Medic Elite]] * [[Agnus Skirmisher]] * [[Agnus Vanguard]]
=== Bosses === * [[Desperate Agnian]]
== Gallery == <gallery> XC3 Agnus Screenshot 2.jpeg|Agnus Forces Three Agnus Soldiers.jpeg|The Three Agnus Forces Mio, Sena, and Taion Desperate Agnian.jpg|The Desperate Agnian Glimmer </gallery>

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Agnus Healer |image = Taion Agnus Healer.jpeg |caption = Agnus Healer |category = Boss |type = [[Agnus Forces]] |level = 8 |area = [[Alfeto Valley]] ([[Gura Flava Lowlands]]) |spawntime = Story, during ''[[Chapter 1 (XC3)|Chapter 1]]'' |respawn = No |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = |gold = |hp = |strength = |ether = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate = }} The '''Agnus Healer''' is a [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] in {{XC3}}. He is an [[Agnus Forces|Agnus Soldier]] and is fought at level 8 at the [[Gura Flava Lowlands]] in [[Alfeto Valley]]. He is then revealed to be [[Taion]]. {{clr}}
{{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Agnus Forces]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 6-10 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Agnus Medic |image = |caption = Agnus Medic |category = Normal Enemy |type = [[Agnus Forces]] |level = 6 |area = [[Alfeto Valley]]
[[Erythia Sea]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Agnus Medics''' are enemies in {{XC3}}. They are [[Agnus Forces|Agnus Soldiers]], and can be found at level 6 in [[Alfeto Valley]], or at [[Erythia Sea]] in the [[Cadensia Region]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Pentelas Region Enemies]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 6-10 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Story Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Agnus Forces]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Agnus Scout |image = |caption = Agnus Scout |category = [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive Enemy]]
Minor Enemy |type = [[Agnus Forces]] |level = ? |area = [[Everblight Plain]]
[[Erythia Sea]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Agnus Scouts''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are [[Agnus Forces|Agnus Soldiers]]. They can be found as [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive Enemies]] at level ? at [[Everblight Plain]] in the [[Aetia Region]] during ''[[Shadow of Enmity]]''. They can be found as normal enemies at level ? in [[Erythia Sea]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Story Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Agnus Forces]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Agnus Skirmisher |image = |caption = Agnus Skirmisher |category = [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive Enemy]]
Minor Enemy |type = [[Agnus Forces]] |level = ? |area = [[Aetia Region]]
[[Cadensia Region]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Agnus Skirmishers''' are [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive Enemies]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They are members of the [[Agnus Forces]] family, and can be found at level ? at [[Everblight Plain]] in the [[Aetia Region]] during ''[[Shadow of Enmity]]''. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Story Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Agnus Forces]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:The Ragmos Desolation Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Agnus Forces]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

[[file:TarunAligo.jpg|thumb|Tarun Aligo]] '''Aligos''' are a family of enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}. They resemble sharks with arms, and come in red and green varieties.
== {{XC2|-}} == In {{XC2}}, Aligos can be found near water or, often, after [[Salvaging]].
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Ferrii Aligo]] (after salvaging) * [[Fissa Aligo]] (after salvaging) * [[Flink Aligo]] (after salvaging) * [[Fuvor Aligo]] * [[Jumbri Aligo]] (after salvaging) * [[Obri Aligo]] * [[Rekon Aligo]] (after salvaging) * [[Smart Aligo]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Tarun Aligo]] (during ''[[Follow Your Passion]]'') * [[Tronk Aligo]] (during ''[[Eternal Spirit]]'')
=== Boss === * [[Megalo Aligo]]
=== Challenge Battle Mode Enemies === * [[Bluth Aligo]] * [[Megayogre Aligo]] * [[Megaspoony Aligo]] * [[Reddeth Aligo]] * [[Spektr Aligo]] * [[Spoony Aligo]] * [[Yogre Aligo]]
== {{XC3|-}} == In {{XC3}}, Aligos can be found near water.
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Aknis Aligo]] * [[Spocked Aligo]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Armuvore Aligo]] (During ''[[To Face Forward]]'')
=== Unique Monster === * [[Massive Georges]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Aknis Aligo]] * [[Spocked Aligo]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Smackdown Brannigan]]
== Gallery == === {{XC2|-}} === <gallery> XC2 Fuvor Aligo.jpeg|Fuvor Aligo YogreAligo.jpg|Yogre Aligo </gallery>
=== {{XC3|-}} === <gallery> XC3 Massive Georges.png|Massive Georges XC3 Aknis Aligo.jpg|Aknis Aligo Armuvore Aligo.png|Armuvore Aligo </gallery>
=== {{XC3FR|sub}} === <gallery> Smackdown Brannigan.jpg|Smackdown Brannigan Spocked Aligo FR.jpg|Spocked Aligo </gallery>
[[Category:XC2 Aligos]] [[Category:XC2 Species]] [[Category:XC2 Aquatic Organisms]] [[Category:XC3 Aligos]] [[Category:XC3 Species]] [[Category:XC3 Aquatic Life]] [[Category:XC3FR Aligos]] [[Category:XC3FR Species]] [[Category:XC3FR Aquatic Life]] [[Category:Aligos]] [[Category:Species by Type]]

[[file:XC3 Budding Francis.png|thumb|Budding Francis]] '''Amoneys''' are a family of aquatic enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}.
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Gerran Amoney]] * [[Hanassa Amoney]] * [[Polima Amoney]] * [[Ranule Amoney]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Budding Francis]] * [[Phantom Streya]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Polima Amoney]]
=== Quest Exclusive Boss === * [[???]] (During ''[[Linka's Birthday]]'')
== Gallery == <gallery> XC3 Phantom Streya.png|Phantom Streya </gallery>
{{clr}}
{{xc3 stub}}

{{Infobox Gem | name = Analyze Weakness | image = Gem-attacker.png | effect = [Passive] Increases critical hit damage bonus by ''(value)'' percentage points. | category = Attacker | max = 70 }} '''Analyze Weakness''' is an Attacker [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Critical Hit Increase |- !I |20 |- !II |25 |- !III |30 |- !IV |35 |- !V |40 |- !VI |45 |- !VII |50 |- !VIII |55 |- ! IX |60 |- !X |70 |} == List of Recipes == At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]].
